name: Color Surfer 3D
description:
The new music game with an awesome experience with the waterpark theme.

A lastest addictive music game! Let’s install Color Surfer 3D and enjoy the simple gameplay to relax with the trending music genre: EDM, Deephouse, Trap, R&B, Pop, Rock...and more!


MAIN FEATURES:
* Popular music sound-track.
* Easy gameplay and quick fitting.
* Game designed in 3D with cute graphics.
* Challenging your skill.

HOW TO PLAY:
Hold & Drag your character to correct color.
